org.nd4j.linalg.jcublas

Class JCublasNDArrayFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.factory.BaseNDArrayFactory
      • org.nd4j.linalg.jcublas.JCublasNDArrayFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NDArrayFactory

    public class JCublasNDArrayFactory
extends BaseNDArrayFactory
    Jcublas ndarray factory. Handles creation of jcuda.jcublas ndarrays.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.nd4j.linalg.factory.BaseNDArrayFactory

        dtype, lapack, level1, level2, level3, order

      • Fields inherited from interface org.nd4j.linalg.factory.NDArrayFactory
